title: Graphic design for medical reference sheet
snippet:
I'm looking for a graphic designer to format, organize, make usable, and beautify the content on a two-sided medical reference sheet for print.

The content has already been collected and assembled.  I will need a few images/anatomical diagrams drawn and the sheet to be generally formatted and organized.

This is a one-time project, but if work is performed well I will be looking to develop a long-term client relationship and provide work in the future.
